original_text: That is what God sent Jesus to do. Jesus did everything that God wanted, just like Moses. Moses served God well when he was the leader of God's people long ago.
korean_text: 그는 자기를 세우신 이에게 신실하시기를 모세가 하나님의 온 집에서 한 것과 같이 하셨으니

sentences.original_text: That is what God sent Jesus to do.
Jesus did everything that God wanted,
sentences.korean_translation: 예수님은 하나님이 원하시는 모든 것을 하셨습니다,

sentences.original_text: when he was the leader of God's people
